ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As well as those two there will be two other Gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And besides these two other gardens --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And besides these two there shall be two other Gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Besides this, there will be two other gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And besides them, there are two more Gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And below these two, there are two other Gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And besides these two are two (other) gardens:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And besides these shall be two gardens --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And beside them are two other gardens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Besides those two there shall be two other gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And beside the two there will be two other Gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Beside these two, there will be two [other] gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And besides these two, there are two other Gardens,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And besides these two, there are two other Gardens (i.e. in Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And beside these there shall be two Gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And beneath them are two gardens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:62]   And beside these, two mentioned gardens, there will be two [other] gardens, in addition, for those who feared the standing before their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And beside them) besides the gardens mentioned earlier (are two other Gardens) which are less than the first two and which are: the Garden of Comfort (jannat al-na'im) and the Garden of Refuge (jannat al- 637 ma'wa),
